scripts.start: prisma generate && prisma db push && nodemon startServer.mjs
scripts.testStart: prisma generate --schema ./prisma/schema-test.prisma && prisma db push --schema ./prisma/schema-test.prisma && nodemon startServer.mjs
scripts.test: rm ./prisma/testDB.db; prisma generate --schema ./prisma/schema-test.prisma; prisma db push --schema ./prisma/schema-test.prisma; c8 nyc mocha --timeout 10000 --cache off
